doc:
W. Chrystie Miller https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W._Chrystie_Miller 0 William Chrystie Miller (August 10, 1843 – September 23, 1922) was an American silent film actor. He appeared in 139 films between 1908 and 1914. Miller frequently appeared in films directed by David Wark Griffith and was known to film audiences as the "Grand Old Man of the Photodrama". On Broadway, Miller played Heinrich in The Devil (1908).He was born in Dayton, Ohio and died in Staten Island, New York. William_Chrystie_Miller ( August_10_,_1843 – September_23_,_1922 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor . He appeared in 139_films between 1908_and_1914 . Miller frequently appeared in films directed by David_Wark_Griffith and was_known to film_audiences as the_"_Grand_Old_Man of the_Photodrama_" . On Broadway , Miller played Heinrich in The_Devil_(_1908_) . He was_born in Dayton_,_Ohio_and died in Staten_Island , New_York .
